name: FiyaFita: Inferno Rescue
description:
"Completed" during 7DRL 2020, in that it currently functions and has an ending you can be graded to have won or lost on but is still far from feature complete, FiyaFita: Inferno Rescue is a roguelike about a single firefighter with a single fire extinguisher running into a burning tower block to save 50 people on 50 floors.

Controls and instructions are included on the main menu, under "Help". As with my other roguelike, users on Windows should run the included .bat to prevent display scaling ruining the graphics.
